author: rajith
msg: This is a fix for the java client for QPID-943.
The 0-8 and 0-9 clients adds the user_id of the connection to the message properties before sending the message

author: rajith
msg: This is a fix for the problem identified in QPID-943.
If msg-auth is configured as true in config.xml the user_id in message properties is verified against the id used at authentication.
If not an exception with error code 403 is thrown.
